# ko-fork Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "ko" {
  docker_repo = "ttl.sh/foo"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `docker_repo` (String) Container repositor to publish images to. Defaults to `KO_DOCKER_REPO` env var
